properties.name: instance.index
properties.description: Turn on if you want to run FAIR Data Point as FAIR Data Point Index

properties.name: security.jwt.token.secret-key
properties.description: Secret string used for JWT signing and validation (we recommend to generate some randomly).

properties.name: security.jwt.token.expiration
properties.description: Number of days until a token expires.

properties.name: ping.enabled
properties.description: States if 'Call home' feature should be enabled

properties.name: fdp-index.enabled
properties.description: States if 'index' functionality should be enabled

properties.name: fdp-index.api.url
properties.description: Server URL where API is running

properties.name: instance.behindProxy
properties.description: If FDP is running behind reverse HTTP proxy
